card_text: Usually, a vanilla minion with no interesting effect is just a pack filler. Just a variation on already existing stuff, just with another stat distribution. This, however, is a bit different. Not only it has above vanilla stats (vanilla 2-drops have 5 stats in total, this has 6), but the distribution makes it incredibly durable. 5 health is very hard to take down so early in the game, meaning that this minion will stick most of the time when dropped on the curve.
